titleStmt.title: A sermon preach'd before the King at St. James's, April 16, 1696 being a day of publick thanksgiving for the discovery of a horrid design to assassinate His Majesty's person, and for the deliverance of the Nation from a French invasion / by ... John, Lord Bishop of Norwich.
titleStmt.author: Moore, John, 1646-1714.

notesStmt.note: Cover and half-title: The Bishop of Norwich's thanksgiving-sermon before the King at St. James's, April 16, 1696.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
